caption.p: Inhibition of butyrylcholinesterase by different extracts of E. fluctuans. Results represent mean Â± SD ( n = 3). Galantamine (GAL) was used as a reference compound. CHE: chloroform extract; EAE: ethyl acetate extract; AQE: aqueous extract; PEE: petroleum ether extract; BuChE: butyrylcholinesterase.
